gameDetails.name: Hungry Hungry Hippos Fun on the Run Game
gameDetails.description:
All the fun of the classic game is back, in this new portable edition! 
Contains everything you need for family fun in the car, at home, in the office, or perhaps on a date. 
Travel-sized version of the marble-grabbing game is compact perfect for hippo-hoarding fun on the go!

Re-implements:

    Hungry Hungry Hippos
